description: After a healthier breakfast? Whip up this banana and oat pancake recipe in just three steps for a delicious way to kickstart your day.
keywords: Pancakes, waffles & French toast,Pescatarian,Low saturated fat,Seafood free,Low salt,Blueberry,Egg free,Healthier Easier,Pancake,Aug 2021,Sesame free,Banana,Strawberry,Halal,High protein,High fibre,Wheat free,Tamara,Vegetarian
name: Blender Pancakes Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Place bananas, oats, baking powder and 1 1/2 cups water in a blender. Blitz for 15 seconds or until mixture is smooth and combined. Set aside for 15 minutes to rest.

Lightly spray a large frying pan with oil, then heat over medium-low heat. Add 1/3 cup batter to pan and spread to form a 12cm round. Cook for 2 minutes or until pancake is cooked two-thirds of the way through. Flip pancake and cook for a further 1 minute or until golden. Transfer to a plate and cover to keep warm. Repeat with remaining batter to make a total 12 pancakes.
Divide pancakes among plates. Top with yoghurt, berries and pecans.
